it.polimi.se2.meteocal.entity

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2.meteocal.entity.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Entity
public class Event
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Entity class for a generic event
